instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message:
Hi everybody,
ASD shows: An issue with the battery (which is not reconizable), tried with various batteries, same issue - ERROR - 22 (Battery Error Condition Set)
An issue with Thermal Interface -Processor: Processor0: TIM Test Percent GB (test #4) - TIM Test 75 percent GB - Check that CPU heatsink is properly attached, using product spec theta dh + 75 percent guardband
ERROR - 255 (Unknown result-code 0xff) - TEST FAILED

The heatsink is obviously well attached.
Any ideas? Thank you

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: If the battery is not recognized it will run slow. This model requires an A1405 model battery. The thermal error should be ignored, your problem is in the battery or no communication with battery.

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message:
no the same problem with a functional battery. What is the Thermal error?

Regards

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: Is the battery recognized in OSX?

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message:
Let`s make some clarifications: The battery is not recognized on OS X (various batteries), ASD OS and EFI were ran with the said results.
​Thanks

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: Well, then you either have a bad ISL6259 or SMC. Most cases it will be the SMC

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: An update: ISL6259 was replaced, the battery is now recognized on OS X but still not charging, the Mac is STILL slow as hell

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: What battery model are you using? Must be A1405. What is OSX saying about the battery, cycle count and status, etc. Also run EFI ASD and check for errors.

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: The battery model is A1405, OS X 10.11, OS X recgnizes the batterie and says "Replace Now", 530 cycles. Again - that was tested with various batteries, all from the same model A1405. ASD EFI and OS still show the same errors as above. Further help will be appreciated

threads.title: 820-3209 works EXTREMELY SLOW suddenly
threads.message: Replace now indicates a dead battery for sure. Use a known good one!
